name: Vine Golem
description: The Vine Golem is a medium-sized construct made of plant materials, adept at blending into its surroundings with a natural camouflage.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate the battlefield by ensnaring enemies and its telepathic bond with its creator make the Vine Golem a unique ally.
goals: To serve and protect its creator while controlling the battlefield.
relations: Typically found serving a creator, it may be encountered alongside other constructs.
environment: Commonly found in areas with plentiful plant life, such as forests or jungles.
strengths: Excels in stealth and battlefield control through grappling and pulling enemies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to slashing damage and less effective against magical attacks.
attacks: Can make two thorned vine melee attacks, dealing piercing damage and manipulating the position of its foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Creator's Eyes and Ears ability allows the creator to use the golem's senses for casting spells strategically.
senses: Has a passive perception score of 12, indicating average awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Stealth with a +6 modifier, making it effective at hiding in natural environments.
additional_information: Ability to communicate telepathically with its creator.
Immune to conditions such as charm and paralysis.
Resistant to nonmagical bludgeoning and piercing damage.
Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in plant-rich areas.
Immutable form prevents alteration by spells.
test_queries: construct that grapples enemies with vines
